mapper.select: select imgUrl, t1.familyId as familyId, t1.orderNo as orderNo, t2.familyName as name from familyScore t1 join familyInfo t2 on (t1.familyId=t2.id) where t2.createUserId=#{userId}
select imgUrl, t1.familyId as familyId, t1.orderNo as orderNo, t2.familyName as name from familyScore t1 join familyInfo t2 on (t1.familyId=t2.id) where t2.id=#{familyId}

select imgUrl, t1.familyId as familyId, t1.orderNo as orderNo, t2.familyName as name, t3.score as score from familyDriveDayStat t1 join familyInfo t2 on (t1.familyId=t2.id) join familyScore t3 on (t1.familyId=t3.familyId) where t1.daystamp=DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d') order by t3.score desc limit 0, 100;
select imgUrl, familyName, t2.orderNo as orderNo from familyInfo t1 left join familyScore t2 on (t1.id=t2.familyId) where t1.id=#{familyId}
select record from familyHistory where familyId=#{familyId} order by id desc

select imgUrl, t1.nickName as name, t1.phone as phone, t1.id as userId, t3.role as role, joinTime from usersAccount t1 join userFamilyRelation t2 on (t1.id=t2.userId) left join userScoreDayStat t3 on (t1.id=t3.userId) where t2.familyId = #{familyId}
select score, role, daystamp as dayStr from userScoreDayStat where userId=#{userId} order by daystamp desc limit #{start}, 10
select score, speedingState, driveState, creditState, steadyState, mileageState from userScoreDayStat where userId=#{userId} and daystamp=#{day}
